text: Don Hoffman is an American author of children’s literature.http://www.scholastic.com/teachers/book/very-special-snowflake His published works include A Very Special Snowflakehttp://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/brightline-interactive- creates-a-very-special-snowflake-e-book-300000746.html and Sparky the Fire Dog.
